title: Where is URF?
body: Where is it. I enjoy URF, I find it really fun? Im kind of pissed they haven't added back in a while!

replies.body: It's in rotating game mode... along with the rest of the modes awaiting its turn.
Rotating game mode? I know that but I feel like its never in the rotation.

Then it was a couple before that then, either way, it was relatively not long ago.

People can wait a few months.
Cause it's not meant to be, as it was a more special type of mode.   At most, we've seen in twice a year.
